snippet: Now is the time for the mayor to make a full transition from campaigning to governing.
abstract: Editorial contends it is time for New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio to make a full transition from campaigning to governing; notes while he has suffered some early setbacks, particularly with respect to his expansion of full-day prekindergarten, it is still too early to pass judgment on his job performance.
lead_paragraph: Now is the time for the mayor to make a full transition from campaigning to governing.

headline.print_headline: The hard turn from campaigning to governing
headline.content_kicker: Editorial | Mayor De Blasio’s Full Plate
